markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Symphony of Blood](/Feats.aspx?ID=5725) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=750" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 45 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You call forth the blood of your foes to grant you vigor. You can cast [_vampiric exsanguination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1735) as a 7th-rank divine innate spell once per day
name: Symphony of Blood
